content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetSiteCertificates path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/delivery/certificates content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name pagerequestfirst
desc the number of items desired
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestafter
desc the cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestfilter
desc sqlstyle constraint filters
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestsortby
desc sort the response by the given field
in query
required false
schema
type str
sum get all site certificates
responses
200
wafgetsitecertificatesresponse
type obj
props
paginationpageinfo
type obj
props
totalcount
type str
desc the total number of items in the dataset
haspreviouspage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasnextpage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not another page of data is available
startcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
desc information about a paginated response

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type arr
wafsitecertificate
type obj
props
valid
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a sites ssl certificate is valid

an ssl certificate is valid when a hostname associated with the site is covered by the certificate
schemawafcertificate
type obj
props
id
type str
desc a certificates unique id
fingerprint
type str
desc a unique hash of a certificates contents
commonname
type str
desc a certificates common name or the primary domain name the certificate is used for
issuer
type str
desc the name of the certificates issuing certificate authority
cabundle
type str
desc a pem pkcs #7 formatted certificate authority bundle
trusted
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not the certificates authority is trusted by a web browser
expirationdate
type str
format datetime
desc the date an ssl certificate will expire
createdate
type str
format datetime
desc the date an ssl certificate was created
updatedate
type str
format datetime
desc the date an ssl certificate was last updated
subjectalternativenames
type str
desc a list of subject alternative names in the certificate

certificates for multiple domains define their domains in certificates san list
schemawafcertificatestatus
type str
default unknown
desc a stackpathprovided certificates status

 unknown stackpath is unable to determine the certificates status this is the default status for enduser provided certificates
  pending the certificate is provisioning
  expired the certificate has expired
  failed the certificate failed to provision
  pendingverification the certificate is pending domain verification by the end user
  active the certificate is valid and is in use by one or more hosts
  inactive the certificate is valid but is not in use by any hosts
providermanaged
type bool
format bool
desc whether a certificate is managed by stackpath or the end user
certificatecertificatestatusdetails
type obj
verificationfailures
type arr
certificatecertificateverificationfailure
type obj
props
domain
type str
desc the host the verification failed on
details
type str
desc detailed information about the failure
checkedat
type str
format datetime
desc the last time the failure was detected
desc a record that indicates why a domain is failing ssl validation
desc failures preventing the certificate from being issued
desc detailed certificate status
desc an ssl certificate
desc an ssl certificate and its relationship with its associated site
desc the requested ssl certificates
desc a response from a request to retrieve a waf sites ssl certificates
title: 23_SSL_GetSiteCertificates_138.json
